title: Tassel, late 17th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core
description: Skirt of red silk threads with tassels partly covered by gilt threads with red silk tassels and yellow silk ornaments. Collar of silk and metal thread in loops. Head, vase turned and covered with silk and metal threads in spiral design. Loop of red silk cord.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, late 17th century.Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core. 1908-2-10.
